name: firefox-tab-organizer
description: AI-powered Firefox Tab Groups organizer using TypeScript and Vercel AI SDK

scripts.build: bun run build:clean && bun run build:ts && bun run build:assets
scripts.build:assets: cp manifest.json dist/ && cp -r src/popup/*.html src/popup/*.css dist/ 2>/dev/null || true && cp -r src/options/*.html src/options/*.css dist/ 2>/dev/null || true && mkdir -p dist/icons
scripts.start: bun run build && web-ext run -s dist/ --browser-console
scripts.package: bun run build && cd dist && zip -r ../firefox-tab-organizer.xpi .

author: bhanutejags
